channel.title: Geopolitical Daily - Strategic Intelligence Beyond the Headlines
channel.description: AI-powered analysis of underreported geopolitical developments with strategic significance. Daily insights on international relations, security, and global power dynamics.

item.title: Geopolitical Daily - November 11, 2025
item.description:
Daily Briefing: Good morning. Today is Tuesday, November 11, 2025. Your daily geopolitical briefing covers 4 key developments shaping global affairs. We've balanced breaking news with in-depth analysis and emerging trends to provide comprehensive coverage for decision-makers. Today's briefing includes immediate developments requiring attention, strategic analysis of ongoing situations, and emerging patterns that will influence international relations in the coming weeks.

Today's Key Stories:

  • EU's China De-Risking Strategy Faces Fragmentation Crisis: The EU's unified approach to China is fracturing across member states with conflicting priorities. This directly impacts European strategic autonomy, technology security, and transatlantic coordinatio...
  • China's Energy-Technology Nexus Reshapes Global Competition: China's thorium reactor breakthrough and clean energy dominance represent dual strategic victories: energy security for Arctic expansion and AI ambitions, plus technological sovereignty. This shifts t...
  • Trump-Orbán Alignment Signals NATO Fracture Over Russia Poli: Trump granting Hungary sanctions exemptions on Russian oil signals willingness to undermine collective Western strategy on Russia. Orbán's high-stakes Washington visit indicates potential NATO policy ...

Published: November 11, 2025
